message: Fix long-range vdW correction for real systems.
More int -> double conversions to avoid overflows on _very_ big systems in which the square of the number of particles in the dominant LJ type overflows integers.
Convert interaction counting to long long int to avoid integer overflows in CustomNonbondedForceImpl long-range correction.
Removed unnecessary synchronization that hurt performance on Nvidia
Fixed a potential divide by zero
Disable OpenCL platform on known-buggy macs
Include force groups when serializing forces
Fixed bug using multiple devices with PME
